title: Pixel XL bricked and recovery lost with bootloader and oem locked , Please Help
content:
I briked my Pixel XL by locking bootloader in fastboot !  I can enter to the bootloader but it's locked. The recovery mode is broken, if I try enter to the recovery mode the phone starts rebooting.
Of course, I can't restore with a OTA zip file becose I can't do "adb sideload image.zip" because, as well I said, I can't enter to recovery mode.
Please Help me , sadly i'm living in iran and cant use RMA
